message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, my budget is limited, and I am only willing to pay up to $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, based on my budget constraints, I can only consider an offer of $100 for the product.
